body:
Hello $(receiver_name), 

It’s a pleasure to meet you! 

My name is [NAME] and I’m reaching out on behalf of [BRAND NAME]. I found your profile on Lifo, and think that your content and vision would be a great match with the values of [BRAND NAME]. 

If you’re interested in learning more about the product, you can find more details as well as campaign details with the link below. 

View Campaign Overview

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me at this email, and I’ll be happy to help! 

Yours, 

[NAME]
subject: Instagram Collaboration Opportunity!

body:
Hello $(receiver_name), 


I hope this email finds you well! 


I came across your account while looking for potential collaborators for [BRAND NAME], and your content looks like it would be a perfect match with our vision and values! 


We’re working on promoting [BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF PRODUCT], and are looking for personalities and content creators who would be as passionate as we are about our product. 


We would love to collaborate with you on a campaign to promote [PRODUCT] on our influencer marketing campaign. Let us know if you’re interested!


Yours, 

[NAME]
subject: Instagram Collaboration Opportunity!

body:
Hello $(receiver_name), 

Your contract is ready. Please use the following link to sign the contract: 

Sign Contract  

Yours, 

[NAME]
subject: Contract Generated
